content.query:
USE gold_db
GO

CREATE or Alter PROC createsqlserverlessView_gold @Viewname NVARCHAR(100)
AS
BEGIN
DECLARE @statement VARCHAR(MAX)
       set @statement = N'CREATE OR ALTER View ' + @Viewname + ' AS 
           Select * from 
           OPENROWSET(
            BULK ''https://projectgenlake2.dfs.core.windows.net/gold/SalesLT/' + @Viewname + '/'',
            Format=''DELTA''
           )as [result]
        '
    

EXEC (@statement)

END
GO
